feed.title: Clipious Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.19.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • allow http traffic by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/539
  • allow custom RYD url by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/540
  • fix issues with app links not opening the related video by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/541

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.6...1.19.7

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.19.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/520
  • Feature/flutter 3.22 by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/549
  • upgrade flutter to fix issues with localisation by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.7...1.19.10

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.19.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • improve warning message when the user enables dearrow by @devraza in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/556
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/554
  • Feature/wizrd not showing for new user by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/566
  • Remove objectbox -> sembast migration code

New Contributors

  • @devraza made their first contribution in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/556

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.10...1.19.11

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.19.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix issue where videos were not loading because servers are missing the genreUrl by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/570

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.11...1.19.12

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/575

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.12...1.20.0
